original_title: S1×ATTACKERSスペシャルコラボ企画 夫の目の前で犯●れて―円満夫婦の落日 葵つかさ
overview: A special collaboration work in which S1 exclusive actress "Tsukasa Aoi" appeared in the popular Attackers series "Criminal in front of her husband"! Keiko, a beautiful wife who is full of happiness, begins living in a new house with her husband. However, a large amount of cash left by her husband Andy at home triggers her to spend days being overwhelmed by the moving man, Shimotsuka. Keiko cares about Andy and desperately hides this, but the worst result awaits ...
title: S1 x ATTACKERS Collaborative Variety Special She Was Fucked In Front Of Her Husband The Destruction Of A Happy Marriage Tsukasa Aoi
